scripts.package: npm run build && docker build --platform linux/amd64 -t polar-chart-app . && docker build --platform linux/amd64 -f Dockerfile.server -t polar-chart-backend .
scripts.deploy:login: aws ecr get-login-password --region eu-west-2 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin 057461649399.dkr.ecr.eu-west-2.amazonaws.com
scripts.deploy:app: export VERSION=$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) && docker tag polar-chart-app:latest 057461649399.dkr.ecr.eu-west-2.amazonaws.com/solent/polar-chart-app:$VERSION && docker tag polar-chart-app:latest 057461649399.dkr.ecr.eu-west-2.amazonaws.com/solent/polar-chart-app:latest && docker push 057461649399.dkr.ecr.eu-west-2.amazonaws.com/solent/polar-chart-app:$VERSION && docker push 057461649399.dkr.ecr.eu-west-2.amazonaws.com/solent/polar-chart-app:latest
scripts.deploy:backend: export VERSION=$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) && docker tag polar-chart-backend:latest 057461649399.dkr.ecr.eu-west-2.amazonaws.com/solent/polar-chart-backend:$VERSION && docker tag polar-chart-backend:latest 057461649399.dkr.ecr.eu-west-2.amazonaws.com/solent/polar-chart-backend:latest && docker push 057461649399.dkr.ecr.eu-west-2.amazonaws.com/solent/polar-chart-backend:$VERSION && docker push 057461649399.dkr.ecr.eu-west-2.amazonaws.com/solent/polar-chart-backend:latest
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:login && npm run deploy:app && npm run deploy:backend
